messages.content: ComfyUI-Danbooru-To-WD converts booru tags to a format suitable for Waifu Diffusion or Danbooru-based models.
How does the conversion process work?

When you input tags into `booru_tags`, the node will convert them into a format compatible with Waifu Diffusion or Danbooru-based models. Alternatively, you can input a partial URL from a Booru site, and the node will recommend Animagine's preferred format. If a URL is specified, it will be prioritized.
What is the purpose of the extension?
The extension is a simple port from the WebUI, and it does not provide any major new features.
Can I input URLs to the `booru_url` field?
Yes, you can input URLs to the `booru_url` field, and the extension will recommend Animagine's preferred format.
What happens if the specified URL is incorrect or the site returns JSON other than expected?
If the specified URL is incorrect or the site returns JSON other than expected, an error will occur.
What communication methods can ComfyUI-Danbooru-To-WD handle?
ComfyUI-Danbooru-To-WD can handle both direct tag input (`booru_tags`) and URL input (`booru_url`). URLs from Booru sites will be converted to Animagine's preferred format.
How does the node handle URLs received from Booru sites?
When URLs are received from Booru sites, the node will recommend Animagine's preferred format, but only if the URL is specified. If a URL is specified, it will be prioritized over direct tag input.
